work_experiences.title: Corekara Inc. (Japan)
responsibility: Based on client requirements, created websites by using HTML5, CSS3, jQuery, JavaScript, PHP for WordPress and Smarty for online shopping websites.
Created and maintained ecommerce websites by using various Content Management System (CMS) which are ColorMeShop, MakeShop and Future Shop.
Customizing blogs and contents for shopping websites by using WordPress to lead for media ecommerce.
Created the responsive website by using CSS media queries.
Understanding cross-browser compatibility and SEO principles in developing websites.
Collaborated with team members for every single projects which are focused on Front End features and UI/ UX.
Liaised with the business team across the entire project as an active member.

work_experiences.title: I Concept Innovation Pte Ltd (Singapore)
responsibility: Good understanding in Ecommerce website solutions.
Develop and build responsive websites with PHP, MySQL Database.
Convert the design source from PSD or AI to a functional website by apply website standard HTML5, CSS3, jQuery, Bootstrap.
Work closely with designer and project managers during website development.
Training and teaching clients how to use the website built for them.
